subSubSection.paragraph:
New to Finland and Russia. First recorded from Finland by
Zatwarnicki and Kahanpaeae (2014)
. Holarctic; in Europe it is known from Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Great Britain, Belgium and Germany ( Zatwarnicki 2013 ).
